Select a section below to begin your calculation

To calculate the impact of an investmnet in Cohesity, begin with the first section below. The information entered therein will automatically populate corresponding fields in the other sections. You will be able to move from section to section to add and/or adjust values to best reflect your organization and process. To return to this screen, click the ROI Dashboard button to the left.

Data Protection Efficiency

Cohesity enables customers to store more data on physical disks through data reduction technologies such as variable length Global deduplication and compression resulting in less storage or consider Tools such as deduplication and compression have helped organizations consume less space. Cohesity builds on these tools and implements the technology differently than traditional vendors. As a result, the same amount of data requires less space to be stored on Cohesity DataPlatform.

Operational Efficiency

Operational efficiency is compromised by the need to manage multiple proprietary systems with different UIs, where each may require specialist administrators. Cohesity simplifies operations through the use of easy and intuitive policy administration through a single pane of glass providing a plug-and-play experience for managing daily operations.
Labor Cost Metrics
Number of employees managing your current solution
Average salary per FTE
Salary load factor(%) (Cost of benefits, etc. Typically 30-35%)

Risk Compliance
Risk Compliance

Cohesity takes a multi-layered security approach to prevent, detect, and analyze threats. Customers can take advantage of native cybersecurity features such as Immutable file system, software encryption, over the wire encryption, multi-factor authentication, DataLock (WORM) to protect their data. In addition, Cohesity DataPlatform is capable of conducting user and behavior analytics for security and compliance reasons.
Assess Risk From Known Vulnerabilities
What industry is your company?
Does your organization perform vulnerability scanning in your production environment?
How frequently?
How often would you scan your environment if performance degradation was not a concern?
Do you take precautions to ensure vulnerabilities are not reintroduced when restoring from a backup?
Does your backup system have WORM?
Does your backup system have Immutable File System?
Does your backup system support Multifactor Authentication?
